name: Project.99_1809
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games. Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD. This month we made 1 game.

[Chruit Ninja] by Sun Park, Jaewon Yoo, Jooeun Hwang, David Lee, Inhye Kim

Play a fruit slash game through your Chrome browser.
(This is a chrome extension game.)

How to play:

Slash fruits by dragging this 'ninja' tab.

You should not slash bomb. Remove bomb by close the 'bomb' tab.

You have 3 life points. (The hearts in tab title) Be safe!
Lastly, if total number of fruit/bomb tabs reaches 8, game over. So move quickly!
